mapper.insert: insert into mf_ckdb(lsh, lrid, username, truename, dept_code, instore_code, outstore_code, status) values(#{lsh},#{lrid},#{username},#{truename},#{deptCode},#{inStoreCode},#{outStoreCode},0)

insert into mf_ckdb_mx(lsh, hh, sl) values
(#{lsh},#{item.hh},#{item.sl})
mapper.update: update mf_ckdb set status=#{status} where status=#{oldStatus} and lsh=#{lsh}
mapper.select: select a.id,lsh,a.hh,sl,b.pinm,b.xingh,b.tm from mf_ckdb_mx a left join mf_sp b on a.hh=b.hh where a.lsh=#{lsh} order by a.id
